alert.note: Alert for Rankin; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 5:29PM CDT until April 17 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Simpson County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Smith County in central Mississippi... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Monterey, or near Pearl, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cato around 550 PM CDT. Johns around 555 PM CDT. White Oak around 610 PM CDT. Burns around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Polkville and Puckett. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
